318770.name: Deep Fritz 14 DLC
318770.description:
This is the Deep Fritz 14 multi-processor engine. Fritz 14 is available with two versions of the chess engine: The “standard” single processor engine (included in Fritz 14), which utilizes one processor for all calculations and only one core of any multi-core processor. For ultimate performance the team at ChessBase has developed the Deep Fritz 14 multi-processor engine, which utilizes multiple processor cores for hyper speed calculations.

Features:

  • Completely redesigned 64 bit engine
  • Supports up to 8 processors
  • Packs almost 100 ELO points more than the previous version
  • Play better faster with the world’s number 1 Chess Engine!
318770.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 意大利语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 荷兰语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
